name: I Want My Hat Back
summary:
I Want My Hat Back is storytelling meme based around retelling the children’s book of the same name with other popular characters losing their hats or other items they are known for having.

The original book was written and illustrated by Jon Klassen and published on September 27th, 2011. 

Bear is looking for his hat, and goes to the creatures of the forest in turn asking whether they've seen it. This includes Rabbit, who definitely didn't take the hat and would never steal anyone's hat.

The original book was reviewed by the New York Times on October 12th, 2011 and a month later, was listed as one of the 10 Best Illustrated Books of 2011.
